Attacks.Name: Flame Burst
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Moltres gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target gains the Incinerate special condition.

Attacks.Name: Sky Attack
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, Moltres may push the target character away S before damage is dealt.

Attacks.Name: Heat Wave
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, enemy characters within Range 2 of the target suffer 1 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Pressure
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters within Range 3 must spend 1 additional power to play active or reactive superpowers.

Superpowers.Name: Fiery Flight
Superpowers.Effect: Moltres may advance L. After the advance, enemy characters within Range 2 gain the Incinerate special condition.

Attacks.Name: Overheat
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Moltres suffers 1 damage and gains 2 power.

Superpowers.Name: Rebirth
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 3 damage from Moltres and gain the Stun special condition.
